This project automatically generates and updates my resume every week using **GitHub Actions** and the **GitHub API**.

### ğŸš€ Features
- Fetches my latest GitHub activity
- Counts stars, repos, followers
- Extracts top languages
- Generates a fresh *Resume.md*
- Updates it every Monday automatically

### ğŸ›  Technology Used
- Python  
- GitHub REST API

### ğŸ“… Update Schedule
Runs **every Monday at 12:00 AM UTC**, plus can be run manually.
